name: CookieBot
body:
# CookieBot

CookieBot is a simple IRC Bot for twitch.tv chat that awards cookie points to people!

### Chat Commands

!cookie <ammount> <username>    Awards <amount> cookie points to <username> (note
                                that <amount> can be a negative number).
!jar <username>                 Shows how many cookies <username> has (if
                                omitted, <username> = yourself).


PS: livinpink is awesome <3
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
